name: Wisconsin Aviation
about: Wisconsin Aviation, established through the legacy of Four Lakes Aviation since 1939, is the state's largest full-service fixed-base operator (FBO) and provider of general aviation services. The flight school offers comprehensive training from private pilot to Airline Transport Pilot (ATP) certifications, utilizing a diversified fleet of rental aircraft, including technologically advanced Cirrus SR20s and Cessna models. Students benefit from Boeingâ€™s Jeppesen flight-training syllabus, Garmin avionics, and advanced aviation training devices. The school conducts formal ground schools and provides simulator training, ensuring high-quality instruction and a structured learning environment. With a rich history in civilian and military training, Wisconsin Aviation continues to be a key player in aviation education and services, preparing highly sought-after graduates for careers in aviation.
services:

Commercial Pilot License
